plugins.name: safety-hooks
plugins.description: Safety hooks to block or require user approval for dangerous commands (rm, git operations, .env access, file size limits)

plugins.name: aichat
plugins.description: Provides skills, hooks, slash commands related to the `aichat` tool-set for searching and resuming CLI-agent sessions

plugins.name: tmux-cli
plugins.description: Provides tmux-cli skill to interact with CLI scripts or other code-agents in tmux panes, using the `tmux-cli` command

plugins.name: workflow
plugins.description: Workflow skills and agents: code-walk-thru, log-work, make-issue-spec skills; ui-tester agent for browser-based UI validation
